item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-07
item.description: Notifi Is Latest Startup Trying to Crack Web 3â€™s Push Notification Problem (1 minute read) Notifi is a company that aims to create better communication rails for crypto projects and wallets, starting with the Solana and Terra ecosystems.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: FTX Pledges Up to $1 Billion for Philanthropic Fund to ‘Improve Humanity’ (2 minute read) Cryptocurrency exchange FTX has announced an up to $1 billion fund for ambitious projects that improve humanity’s long-term prospects.

item.title: Crypto Update NEWS 2022-01-24
item.description: Latest Solana Clog Causes Liquidation Bloodbath (2 minute read) The Solana network suffered congestion issues over the weekend as crypto assets plummeted.
